moduleDescription: This module builds on knowledge taught in the undergraduate research programme. Common research designs used in nursing will be examined with a focus on methodology and methods. Students will acquire knowledge and skills in writing a research question, developing aims, and describing the process of constructing a systematic search strategy and an integrative review of the literature. The process of ethical research will be discussed and avenues for the dissemination of results will be explored.
faculty: YONG LOO LIN SCHOOL OF MEDICINE
department: NURSING/ALICE LEE CTR FOR NURSING STUD
